tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V1.56.22 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
programme.desc: Two children and their dog must use all their skills to survive in the African bush after a plane crash. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenager discovers to his horror that he is a werewolf, and flees for his life after his first transformation has terrible consequences. He makes his way to a remote town that provides a safe haven for the creatures, but his new home proves dangerous when a deadly rivalry develops with the pack leader. Horror, starring Lucas Till, Stephen McHattie and Jason Momoa.

programme.title: Hyena Road
programme.desc: Adept Canadian sharpshooter Ryan Sanders and his unit are forced to take refuge with an village elder while on the run from Taliban fanatics in Afghanistan. Resigned to their fate, the soldiers anxiously wait for the old man to betray them to his countrymen, but instead he saves their lives, then disappears without a trace. When Sanders reports this unusual turn of events on his return to Kandahar, seasoned intelligence officer Pete Mitchell is convinced the sniper has happened upon the legendary Afghan freedom fighter known as the Ghost, and enlists Sanders' aid in tracking the man down once again to assist in the war effort. Military drama, starring Rossif Sutherland and director Paul Gross.

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: An inventive chef's unconventional methods make him the toast of Paris, but his career is derailed by an alcohol and drugs-fuelled meltdown. An old friend offers him a second chance by hiring him to take over the kitchens of an exclusive London restaurant, but has a hard time keeping his acerbic nature in check. Drama, starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Daniel Bruhl, Emma Thompson and Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenager discovers to his horror that he is a werewolf, and flees for his life after his first transformation has terrible consequences. He makes his way to a remote town that provides a safe haven for the creatures, but his new home proves dangerous when a deadly rivalry develops with the pack leader. Horror, starring Lucas Till, Stephen McHattie and Jason Momoa.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: A race of strange, babbling yellow creatures has served the cause of evil throughout the history of the world. In the 1960s, three of these eternal henchmen get a job working for a criminal genius who is hatching a plot against the British crown - but while carrying out her orders, they uncover a threat to their whole species. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: Hannah, the niece of Southern drugs kingpin Frank Stinson, longs to escape the spiral of violence that dominates her existence. When her impressionable sister Amber falls in love with Wild Bill, one of Uncle Frank's bitter rivals, Hannah spots a way to finally put an end to her misery by using her guile to pit the two men against each other in a vengeful game. Crime thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Sean Bean and Alexa Vega.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Three friends decide to start their own business, but the plan is derailed when a duplicitous investor swindles them. They hatch a plan to get their money back by kidnapping the businessman's son and demanding a ransom. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Jason Sudeikis, Charlie Day, Jennifer Aniston and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: A former soldier working as a nightclub bouncer and enforcer for a Mob boss is hired to deliver a mysterious package to an international crime lord. The simple assignment is complicated when he discovers lethal hitmen and gangs of mercenaries have been tasked with stopping him. Action adventure, with Steve Austin and Dolph Lundgren.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: Biopic of James Brown, examining key moments in the soul singer's life, from his impoverished childhood in South Carolina to his rise to become one of the most influential figures in music history, and following his intense friendship with fellow singer Bobby Byrd. Starring Chadwick Boseman, Viola Davis, Nelsan Ellis and Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating Owen Shaw and his crew and securing amnesty for their past crimes, Dom, Brian and the rest of the team return home to live normal lives again. However Shaw's older brother Deckard - a rogue special forces assassin vows revenge on Dom, who he holds responsible for leaving Owen in a coma. Action thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Jason Statham and Paul Walker in his last film role.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: The people of a small town live in fear of underground trolls, which they do not realise are actually harmless. A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: A squirrel living in a city park faces a harsh winter ahead. He sees fresh hope when he discovers a shop selling nuts, and recruits the other animals to carry out a daring heist that will provide enough food to keep them going through the cold months ahead. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Arnett, Brendan Fraser and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: The people of a small town live in fear of underground trolls, which they do not realise are actually harmless. A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating Owen Shaw and his crew and securing amnesty for their past crimes, Dom, Brian and the rest of the team return home to live normal lives again. However Shaw's older brother Deckard - a rogue special forces assassin vows revenge on Dom, who he holds responsible for leaving Owen in a coma. Action thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Jason Statham and Paul Walker in his last film role.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: An expedition ventures into a network of underground tunnels beneath Paris. As they explore the catacombs, the archaeologists experience a series of strange events and come under attack from a mysterious unknown force that seems to know their darkest secrets. Horror, starring Perdita Weeks and Ben Feldman.(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: A doomed love affair between two Wyoming cowboys develops over the course of 20 years. The relationship begins when they are hired to herd sheep on a remote mountain in the 1960s, and though they go their separate ways and try to settle down to married life, they are unable to overcome their desire for each other and continue to meet in secret. Ang Lee's drama, starring Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Williams and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.(n)

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.(n)

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, and a government operative is determined to capture him for study. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi fantasy, starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Dee Wallace and Peter Coyote.(n)

programme.title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A faded movie star famous for his role in a series of superhero movies 20 years previously tries to reclaim his artisitic integrity by directing and starring in a Broadway play. The experience plunges him into a personal crisis as both the production and his own family are beset by a series of disasters. Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Keaton, Edward Norton and Emma Stone.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: A male stripper who retired from the stage three years ago is persuaded to put on one last show. A troupe of dancers are also planning to call it a day and recruit him to headline their final show. The guys head off on a road trip to the venue, making some new friends and picking up a few new moves along the way. Drama sequel, starring Channing Tatum and Joe Manganiello.(n)

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A wicked witch agrees to lift a curse on a young couple if they will help restore her once beautiful looks. Based on Stephen Sondheim's hit stage musical, the plot also entwines the fairy tale stories of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel. Musical fantasy, starring Meryl Streep, Johnny Depp, James Corden and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, and a government operative is determined to capture him for study. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi fantasy, starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Dee Wallace and Peter Coyote.(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: A male stripper who retired from the stage three years ago is persuaded to put on one last show. A troupe of dancers are also planning to call it a day and recruit him to headline their final show. The guys head off on a road trip to the venue, making some new friends and picking up a few new moves along the way. Drama sequel, starring Channing Tatum and Joe Manganiello.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Two men receive life sentences for a crime they did not commit. Once behind bars, their situation becomes even more dire when they discover petty differences can easily be magnified into reasons for all-out war. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Martin Lawrence, Ned Beatty, Rick James, Bernie Mac, Bokeem Woodbine and Obba Babatunde.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: Four siblings return home to attend their father's funeral, and are reunited with their overbearing mother. Each brings with them unresolved personal crises, and as they observe the Jewish ritual of Shiva, they find themselves forced to deal with each other's secrets and mistakes. Comedy drama based on Jonathan Tropper's novel, starring Jason Bateman, Tina Fey and Jane Fonda.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
programme.desc: The Australian adventurer heads for the bright lights of LA with his wife and son - but it is not long before they become embroiled in a scheme to smuggle valuable paintings out of the former Yugoslavia. Comedy sequel, starring Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, Jere Burns, Jonathan Banks and Serge Cockburn.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Three couples compete for the title of Most Original Wedding of the Year, with a film crew following the preparations. Theatre-loving Matt and Sam plan a musical marriage, naturists Michael and Joanna brave the elements for their all-nude nuptials, while fiercely competitive Josef and Isabelle warm up for a sporty ceremony. Spoof documentary, starring Martin Freeman, Jessica Hynes, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman, Stephen Mangan and Meredith MacNeill.

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: A student causes chaos in an exclusive private school with his temperamental nature - and things go from bad to worse when he develops a crush on a teacher. A wealthy but miserable businessman strikes up a friendship with the troubled teenager, but when he also falls for the same woman, all-out war is declared. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Jason Schwartzman, Bill Murray, Olivia Williams and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Analyze This
programme.desc: A stressed mobster is plagued by anxiety attacks that leave him incapable of killing. When a car crash brings him into contact with a psychiatrist, he thinks he has found the solution to his problems. Naturally, the horrified shrink is reluctant to be drawn into the world of organised crime - especially when the gangster starts to intrude on his personal life, and the FBI tries to recruit him as a mole. Comedy, with Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal, Lisa Kudrow, Chazz Palminteri and Joe Viterelli.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A journalist lives her life by her father's maxim that monogamy never works, and has spent her adult life enjoying freedom from commitment. When she is sent to interview a doctor, an attraction develops between them, and she begins to wonder if there mighty be something to be said for a stable relationship. Comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson and Tilda Swinton.

programme.title: The 40 Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: A middle-aged shop worker reveals he has never been intimate with a woman, which prompts his shocked colleagues to set him up with a series of potentially passionate dates. When he falls for a single mother, his friends think he is right on course for a lusty liaison, but his new partner is not ready for a physical relationship. Judd Apatow's comedy, starring Steve Carell, Catherine Keener and Paul Rudd.

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: A table tennis champion's life falls apart after defeat at the Olympics. However, he gets the chance to redeem himself and get revenge when the FBI recruits him to infiltrate a secret underground ping-pong tournament run by an elusive criminal genius. Comedy sending up kung fu movies, starring Dan Fogler, Christopher Walken and Maggie Q.

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A journalist lives her life by her father's maxim that monogamy never works, and has spent her adult life enjoying freedom from commitment. When she is sent to interview a doctor, an attraction develops between them, and she begins to wonder if there mighty be something to be said for a stable relationship. Comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson and Tilda Swinton.

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away their best friend's fiancee, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary. Comedy, starring Adam Pally, TJ Miller and Thomas Middleditch.

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: A Kazakhstani journalist is sent to the United States to learn about the country and its customs. However, when the inquisitive reporter stumbles across an episode of Baywatch featuring Pamela Anderson, he becomes convinced she is his future bride and embarks on a reckless mission to track her down. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian and Pamela Anderson.(n)

programme.title: Revenge for Jolly
programme.desc: A man who loves his dog more than anything else wakes from a drinking binge to find his four-legged friend has been killed under mysterious circumstances. He loads his car up with all the guns he can find and sets off on a rampage of destruction to find the person responsible. Comedy, starring Brian Petsos, Kristen Wiig and Elijah Wood.(n)

programme.title: Mr Woodcock
programme.desc: The successful author of a self-help book has managed to put the painful memories of being bullied by his PE teacher as a chubby youngster behind him. However, when he returns to his home town to accept a prestigious award, the writer is horrified to discover his mother is planning to marry his childhood tormentor. Comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott and Susan Sarandon.(n)

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A by-the-book Los Angeles cop is paired with a laidback new partner to investigate the nefarious activities of a TV evangelist and a pornographic-magazine baron suspected of operating a criminal cult. Comedy spoof of the 1950s TV series, starring Dan Aykroyd, Tom Hanks, Christopher Plummer and the original show's star Harry Morgan.(n)

programme.title: One Night in Istanbul
programme.desc: Two Liverpool cabbies strike a deal with a gangster so they can take their sons to watch the European Cup Final in Istanbul. However, they get more than they bargained for thanks to a hotel chambermaid, two crooks on a mission and a bag of forged money. Comedy drama, starring Steven Waddington, Paul Barber and Lucien Laviscount.(n)

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.(n)

programme.title: Analyze That
programme.desc: A Mob boss pretends to have a nervous breakdown to get out of jail, and is promptly released into the custody of his psychiatrist, who is forced to provide the criminal with a place to stay. However, tired of their unwanted guest's slobbish ways, the doctor and his wife find him a job on a TV show - as a consultant with an unusual specialism. Comedy sequel, with Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Despite working together for nine years, police partners Jimmy and Paul frequently struggle to get along. When Paul's erratic behaviour leads to the pair being suspended without pay, Jimmy is forced to sell a rare baseball card to raise funds for his daughter's wedding. However, when the collector selling the item is robbed, the duo team up to recover the memorabilia. Action comedy, starring Bruce Willis, Tracy Morgan, Juan Carlos Hernandez, Cory Fernandez and Ana de la Reguera.(n)

programme.title: Let's Be Cops
programme.desc: Two friends go to a fancy-dress party as police officers, and are amazed by how people on the street react to their uniforms. They decide to pose as cops in the hope of enjoying the perks of the job, but soon end up in over their heads with gangsters and corrupt members of the real force. Comedy, starring Jake Johnson and Damon Wayans Jr.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man makes the mistake of engaging a cable TV installer in conversation in a ploy to get all the channels for free. However, the manic repairman shows an invincible determination to be his new best friend - and does not take kindly to rejection. Comedy directed by Ben Stiller, starring Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick and George Segal.(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: A scientist working on synthetic skin is horribly disfigured and left for dead by a criminal gang. Now unable to feel pain, he continues his research, creating artificial faces that will last for only a short time. He uses these disguises to aid him in taking revenge on those who mutilated him - while also using a mask of his own face to see the girlfriend who thinks he died. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand.

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: A luxury cruise liner at sea on New Year's Eve is struck by a freak tidal wave, which leaves it capsized and several passengers and crew trapped. A rebellious priest realises the ship is sinking fast, and leads a band of survivors up through the vessel in search of a way to the surface. Disaster movie, starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Leslie Nielsen and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: The Dukes of Hazzard
programme.desc: Deep South rogues Bo and Luke Duke wheel out their iconic Dodge Charger to stop a corrupt commissioner and the local sheriff from closing down the family farm. With the help of their cousin Daisy and Uncle Jesse, the pair set about foiling the dastardly scheme, only to uncover a larger plot is placing the entire town in jeopardy. Comedy adaptation of the TV series, starring Seann William Scott, Johnny Knoxville, Willie Nelson, Jessica Simpson and Burt Reynolds.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: The emperor of Japan recruits an American Civil War veteran to train his troops in a bid to wipe out a rebel faction of samurai warriors. The soldier is taken captive when the imperial army is defeated, and comes to respect his enemies' traditions and code of honour, finally going over to their side. Historical adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Ken Watanabe, Timothy Spall, Billy Connolly and Shichinosuke Nakamura.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A veteran car thief is forced out of retirement to steal 50 top-of-the-range vehicles in exchange for his brother's life. While his sibling is held hostage by a sadistic gangster, he asks his former cronies to help - but with the clock ticking and just a few days remaining to pull off the daunting task, their chances of success are hanging by a thread. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi and Robert Duvall.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russia's first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelow's fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard.(n)

programme.title: Sword of Vengeance
programme.desc: In 11th century Britain, a mysterious stranger known only as Shadow Walker returns home after years in slavery and immediately turns a group of local men into ruthless killers - but do they have the ability to overthrow their tyrannical ruler? Action adventure, with Stanley Weber and Annabelle Wallis.(n)

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: Wisecracking gambler Bret Maverick and con artist Annabelle Bransford cheat their way across the Wild West to make the money they need to enter a high-stakes, once-in-a-century poker tournament, with a ruthless rival on their trail and a principled lawman as an unlikely travelling companion. Comedy Western, starring Mel Gibson and Jodie Foster, with James Garner, star of the original TV series, alongside Graham Greene and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangster's henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips.(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced former cop is arrested by the FBI for illegal street racing, but his one-time colleagues offer him freedom in exchange for going on an undercover mission. Teaming up with an old racing friend and a customs official, he has to infiltrate and bring down a drug-trafficking operation. Thriller sequel, with Paul Walker reprising his role from The Fast and the Furious alongside Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes and Cole Hauser.(n)

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: A veteran American sergeant leads a tank crew on one final dangerous mission in the last months of the Second World War. The assignment takes the soldiers behind enemy lines and into battle with overwhelming enemy forces, while the presence of an inexperienced new recruit in the team raises tension. Drama, starring Brad Pitt and Shia LaBeouf.(n)

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: A warrior resolves to hang up his sacred sword and live a life of peace - but the weapon is stolen. The swordsman and his fighting partner, who harbour a repressed love for one another, go hunting for the thief, leading them to a girl under the threat of a forced marriage and who has a hidden talent for combat. Ang Lee's Oscar-winning martial arts drama, starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Cheng Pei-Pei and Zhang Ziyi. In Mandarin.(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A submarine captain working for a salvage company is laid off, and attempts to turn his fortunes around by recovering a lost treasure rumoured to have sunk to the depths of the Black Sea. However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker.(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced former cop is arrested by the FBI for illegal street racing, but his one-time colleagues offer him freedom in exchange for going on an undercover mission. Teaming up with an old racing friend and a customs official, he has to infiltrate and bring down a drug-trafficking operation. Thriller sequel, with Paul Walker reprising his role from The Fast and the Furious alongside Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes and Cole Hauser.(n)

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: A veteran American sergeant leads a tank crew on one final dangerous mission in the last months of the Second World War. The assignment takes the soldiers behind enemy lines and into battle with overwhelming enemy forces, while the presence of an inexperienced new recruit in the team raises tension. Drama, starring Brad Pitt and Shia LaBeouf.(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Daniel Radcliffe. Harry Potter lives a miserable existence with his loathsome aunt and uncle. That is until he learns from a giant named Hagrid that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at the prestigious Hogwarts boarding school for wizards and soon embarks on a new life filled with magic and mystery.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure sequel to The Philosopher's Stone, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson. When Harry, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for a new term, they discover a sinister message written in blood on a wall. Is it a sign that the dark forces of Lord Voldemort have infiltrated the school?.(r)

programme.title: Marathon Man"}, (?)
programme.desc: Thriller based on the novel by William Goldman, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. In New York, two elderly men are killed in a traffic accident that is the catalyst for a chain of violent events. In Paris, an attempt is made on the life of maverick US agent Doc Levy. Back in Manhattan, Doc's brother Babe is soon to find himself part of a deadly plot involving the sinister Dr Szell, the infamous Nazi known as the 'White Angel'.(r)

programme.title: Austin Powers: the Spy Who Shagged Me"}, (?)
programme.desc: Spy spoof sequel starring Mike Myers and Heather Graham. Austin Powers travels back to 1969 to confront his adversary, Dr Evil, who has stolen his 'mojo'. Meanwhile, Dr Evil is planning to attack Washington DC with a giant laser. Only Powers, with assistance from beautiful CIA operative Felicity Shagwell, can thwart the doctor's ambitions.

programme.title: Johnny English"}, (?)
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. When the crown jewels are stolen from under the nose of the authorities, bumbling secret agent Johnny English is assigned to retrieve them and capture the culprits. The unfortunate spy is soon in over his head when he discovers that the theft is part of an evil plan to seize the British throne.(r)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service"}, (?)
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Will the youngster prove to be a chip off the old block by proving useful during a battle against a twisted, hi-tech genius? Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III"}, (?)
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Michelle Monaghan. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is retired from active duty and trying to live a quiet life with his new fiancée, Julia. When an operative he personally trained is kidnapped while investigating ruthless arms dealer Owen Davian, Hunt agrees to help rescue her, but the mission goes disastrously wrong.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October"}, (?)
programme.desc: Cold War thriller starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and Scott Glenn. The trial voyage of new Soviet submarine Red October does not go as expected. Equipped with an experimental new propulsion system that makes it virtually impossible to track and captained by the enigmatic Marko Ramius, the heavily armed vessel heads for America. Is Ramius about to launch an undetectable, pre-emptive nuclear strike?.(r)

programme.title: Austin Powers: the Spy Who Shagged Me"}, (?)
programme.desc: Spy spoof sequel starring Mike Myers and Heather Graham. Austin Powers travels back to 1969 to confront his adversary, Dr Evil, who has stolen his 'mojo'. programme.title: xXx: the Next Level"}, (?)
programme.desc: Spy thriller sequel starring Ice Cube, Willem Dafoe and Samuel L Jackson. When a devious general threatens to overthrow the government, US Intelligence chief Augustus Gibbons concocts the perfect solution - recruit dangerous renegade Darius Stone as the new secret agent XXX.(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!"}, (?)
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State"}, (?)
programme.desc: Conspiracy thriller starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman and Jon Voight. Successful lawyer Robert Clayton Dean is out shopping when he unwittingly becomes the custodian of evidence to a political murder. Soon the bewildered Dean is on the run, trying to stay one step ahead of a sinister adversary who has an arsenal of hi-tech surveillance gadgetry at his disposal.(n)

programme.title: Spy"}, (?)
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: xXx: the Next Level"}, (?)
programme.desc: Spy thriller sequel starring Ice Cube, Willem Dafoe and Samuel L Jackson. When a devious general threatens to overthrow the government, US Intelligence chief Augustus Gibbons concocts the perfect solution - recruit dangerous renegade Darius Stone as the new secret agent XXX.(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor"}, (?)
programme.desc: Thriller starring Robert Redford and Faye Dunaway. After the offices of a CIA research branch are attacked, only Joe Turner is left alive. On the run from the killers, Turner seeks help from his bosses, but discovers there is a traitor among them.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State"}, (?)

Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Taken"}, (?)
programme.desc: Action drama starring Liam Neeson as former CIA operative Bryan Mills, who calls upon his tried-and-tested skills in a race-against-time bid to rescue his daughter from the sex traffickers who have kidnapped her during a holiday in France.(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!"} (?)

Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: Secretariat
programme.desc: A housewife takes over running her ailing father's stables, and is unwelcome in the male-dominated world of horse racing. With the aid of a veteran trainer, she turns one of her racehorses into a champion who goes on to achieve a spectacular winning streak. Fact-based drama, starring Diane Lane, John Malkovich and Dylan Walsh.

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka.

programme.title: The Tigger Movie
programme.desc: Tigger realises being the only one of his kind makes for a lonely life, so he sets off on a bold quest to find more creatures just like him, with the help of his woodland friends. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings, Nikita Hopkins, Ken Sansom, John Fiedler, Tom Attenborough and Peter Cullen.

programme.title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
programme.desc: Winnie the Pooh and his pals hear rumbling noises in the distance, and bravely set out to trap the feared and monstrous heffalump. Meanwhile, Roo stays at home and makes friends with a young and amiable heffalump named Lumpy, proving once and for all that the creatures are nothing to be afraid of. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and Brenda Blethyn.

programme.title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
programme.desc: The Arabian adventurer prepares to marry his beloved Jasmine, but gets distracted by a gang of robbers who have stolen a powerful magical artefact, as well as the news that his long-lost father is still alive. Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger, Linda Larkin and John Rhys-Davies.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Three children are visited in the night by a magical flying boy and a fairy named Tinker Bell. The strange youngster takes them away to his home, the magical island of Neverland, where his band of runaway youngsters are engaged in an ongoing battle with a crew of pirates. Disney animated adventure based on JM Barrie's novel, with the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Hans Conried.

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan is forced to live a life of servitude by her cruel stepmother. The king of the realm she lives in organises a lavish ball to find a bride for his son, and a caring fairy godmother puts her magic to the task of turning the downtrodden girl into a princess. Disney animated fairytale, with the voices of Ilene Woods, William Phipps and Verna Felton.

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
programme.desc: The fairy and her friends work together to restore the source of their magical power and ensure the world's supply of pixie dust does not run out. However, when Tinker Bell accidentally jeopardises their plans, she must go on a dangerous quest to find a way of putting things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Three children are visited in the night by a magical flying boy and a fairy named Tinker Bell. The strange youngster takes them away to his home, the magical island of Neverland, where his band of runaway youngsters are engaged in an ongoing battle with a crew of pirates. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: The Black Hole
programme.desc: An intergalactic research team is lulled into a false sense of security by a mad scientist planning to explore a collapsed star - and attacked by his army of deadly androids. Sci-fi adventure, starring Maximilian Schell, Anthony Perkins and Ernest Borgnine, with Roddy McDowall providing the voice of the heroes' robot companion.

programme.title: The Cat from Outer Space
programme.desc: A UFO crash-lands on Earth and its only occupant is an alien cat whose collar gives him strange powers, including the ability to communicate telepathically with humans. This turns out to be a useful skill when he is forced to enlist help to get his spaceship back after the US government seizes it. Disney sci-fi comedy, with Roddy McDowall and Sandy Duncan.

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy has a day where everything seems to go wrong, but gets no sympathy from his family. He becomes convinced that bad things only ever happen to him, but then his parents, his brother and his sister all suffer terrible days of their own. Family comedy based on Judith Viorst's series of children's books, starring Ed Oxenbould, Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure

Animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.(n)

This turns out to be a useful skill when he is forced to enlist help to get his spaceship back after the US government seizes it. Disney sci-fi comedy, with Roddy McDowall and Sandy Duncan.(n)

programme.title: Mars Needs Moms
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy sees a spacecraft land and kidnap his mother. He stows away on board as the ship travels back to the aliens' Mars homeland. As he tries to rescue her, he learns the Martians have taken her because they need Earth mothers to raise their own children. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Seth Robert Dusky, Dan Fogler and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphaned girl is treated as a servant by her cruel stepmother and her two daughters. Her life is changed for ever by the intervention of a kindly fairy godmother, who gives her the opportunity to attend a lavish royal and win the heart of a handsome prince. Romantic fantasy, starring Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden and Helena Bonham Carter.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue
programme.desc: Tinker Bell travels to the human world for the first time and befriends a little girl. However, when the child's scientist father discovers the fairy, he takes her away for study in the hope of learning more about the magical creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Finding Pixar
programme.desc: Documentary about the animation studio.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell.(n)

programme.title: Your Friend the Rat
programme.desc: Animated short, in which Remy and Emile, the rodent characters from Ratatouille, try to convince the human race that their species is not as unpleasant as they seem and demonstrate the relationship between people and rats throughout history. With the voices of Patton Oswalt and Peter Sohn.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphaned girl is treated as a servant by her cruel stepmother and her two daughters. Her life is changed for ever by the intervention of a kindly fairy godmother, who gives her the opportunity to attend a lavish royal and win the heart of a handsome prince. Romantic fantasy, starring Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden and Helena Bonham Carter.(n)

programme.title: The Black Cauldron
programme.desc: A pig farmer struggles to stop an evil king taking control of a supernatural cauldron with the power to grant immortality, and sets out to bring an end to the villain's reign of terror with a trusty band of friends. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of John Hurt, Grant Bardsley and Nigel Hawthorne.(n)

programme.title: White Fang
programme.desc: A prospector sets off for Alaska during the gold rush, and along the way he encounters a wolf-dog being cruelly treated by its owner. He sets the animal free and tames it, gaining a constant companion for his perilous journey through the wilderness. Adventure, based on Jack London's novel, starring Ethan Hawke, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Seymour Cassel.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Longwood
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Mickey Miller moves from New York to Ireland, where she discovers a link between herself and the 300-year-old legend of a mysterious knight who regularly haunts the sleepy village. But will it give her the power to save a previous herd of white horses? Magical family drama, starring Lucy Morton, Thekla Reuten, Fiona Glascott, Lorcan Cranitch and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teenager living in a peaceful community is sent to assist the old man who is the keeper of the settlement's history. The assignment leads him to uncover the dark secrets behind his idyllic surroundings, and he realises he must find a way to escape. Sci-fi adventure based on Lois Lowry's novel, starring Jeff Bridges, Brenton Thwaites and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A penguin longs to follow in the footsteps of his hero, legendary surfer Big Z, and leaves his Antarctic home to compete in a prestigious tournament on a tropical island. Unfortunately the waves in this warmer climate are much bigger than anything he has experienced - and the egotistical reigning champion does not take kindly to competition. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf.

programme.title: Free Willy
programme.desc: A troubled youngster befriends a captive killer whale while working at a marine park. However, their friendship looks set to be short-lived when he learns the park's greedy owners plan to kill the animal, forcing the boy into a race against time to release the creature back into the ocean. Family drama, starring Jason James Richter, Lori Petty and Michael Madsen.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small town's annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Kermit's Swamp Years
programme.desc: The fast-talking frog sets out in pursuit of a kidnapper who has abducted his friend. Leaving the safety of his marshland home, he follows a trail that leads him to the bright lights of Hollywood - but he also has to contend with an evil scientist along the way. Muppet comedy adventure, with Christian Kebbel and the voices of Steve Whitmire, Dave Goelz and Bill Baretta.

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small town's annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

Muppet comedy adventure, with Christian Kebbel and the voices of Steve Whitmire, Dave Goelz and Bill Baretta.
