The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: Free Willy
programme.desc: A troubled youngster befriends a captive killer whale while working at a marine park. However, their friendship looks set to be short-lived when he learns the park's greedy owners plan to kill the animal, forcing the boy into a race against time to release the creature back into the ocean. Family drama, starring Jason James Richter, Lori Petty and Michael Madsen.

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Bankruptcy forces the Carraclough family to sell their devoted pet to a mean-spirited duke and his wife. But, when the well-to-do couple move away, Lassie pines for her first home and decides to track down her former owners. Family adventure, starring Peter O'Toole, Samantha Morton, John Lynch, Peter Dinklage, Steve Pemberton and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure
programme.desc: The little pup struggles to establish his own identity among his numerous brothers and sisters. He embarks on an exciting escapade across the capital with his favourite TV star, but the sinister Cruella DeVil returns to cause more havoc. Animated sequel, with the voices of Bobby Lockwood, Barry Bostwick, Jason Alexander, Martin Short and Sam West.(n)

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A penguin longs to follow in the footsteps of his hero, legendary surfer Big Z, and leaves his Antarctic home to compete in a prestigious tournament on a tropical island. Unfortunately the waves in this warmer climate are much bigger than anything he has experienced - and the egotistical reigning champion does not take kindly to competition. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial art skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue.(n)

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs Bizarro League
programme.desc: Animated action-adventure, with the voices of Diedrich Bader and Nolan North. Superman and the Justice League team up with their Bizarro League counterparts to thwart Darkseid's attempt to conquer the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.(n)

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs Bizarro League
programme.desc: Animated action-adventure, with the voices of Diedrich Bader and Nolan North. Superman and the Justice League team up with their Bizarro League counterparts to thwart Darkseid's attempt to conquer the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.(n)

programme.title: Look Who's Talking
programme.desc: Pregnant Mollie is dumped by her boyfriend, and sets out after the baby's birth to find a surrogate father for her infant son Mikey, who comments on proceedings through a wisecracking inner monologue. Mikey is confident the cab driver who helped deliver him is the perfect man for the job - but his mother is less than convinced. Comedy, with John Travolta, Kirstie Alley and the voice of Bruce Willis.(n)

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The CIA becomes suspicious of Russia's nuclear activities, and agent Jack Ryan is ordered to investigate. However, it is not long before the threat of terrorists detonating a nuclear bomb on American soil is on the cards, sparking a race against the clock to avert disaster. Thriller based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Morgan Freeman, James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan and Alan Bates.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: The Air I Breathe
programme.desc: Four people facing crises in their lives, are all linked by their connection to a mysterious mob boss. A doctor strives to save the woman he loves, a businessman bets his life on a fixed horse race, a singer faces the end of her career and a gangster experiences psychic visions. Crime drama, starring Andy Garcia, Kevin Bacon, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Forest Whitaker, Brendan Fraser, Julie Delpy and Kelly Hu.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: A cash-strapped chauffeur is up to his neck in debt to a bookie, but thinks that escorting a billionaire around LA will raise enough money to pay off his creditor. Unfortunately, his wealthy passenger turns out to be not only crazy, but also a wanted man. Comedy thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Chris Pine and Jessica Alba.

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: A hitman is hired by two notorious gangster brothers to murder a politician. He falls for a woman during the assignment, but does not realise she is his victim's daughter. Her investigation of her father's death threatens to cause a gang war and puts the assassin at odds with his employers. Crime thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Gary and Martin Kemp.

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A teenager in the 1980s idolises a band of football hooligans and is soon drawn into their ranks. As their confrontations with rival teams' supporters grow increasingly violent, he begins to realise he has made a mistake getting involved - but finds leaving the firm is not easy. Remake of Alan Clarke's 1989 drama, starring Calum MacNab and Paul Anderson.(n)

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: A hitman is hired by two notorious gangster brothers to murder a politician. He falls for a woman during the assignment, but does not realise she is his victim's daughter. Her investigation of her father's death threatens to cause a gang war and puts the assassin at odds with his employers. Crime thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Gary and Martin Kemp.(n)

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Bonnie and Clyde
programme.desc: Bored small-town woman Bonnie Parker begins a passionate love affair with petty crook Clyde Barrow, and together they embark on a headline-grabbing crime spree across the Depression-era American Midwest. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Gene Hackman, Michael J Pollard, Gene Wilder and an Oscar-winning Estelle Parsons.(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: The true story of Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein, who persevered in their investigation of the links between the Watergate break-in and the White House, a scandal that eventually forced the resignation of President Nixon. Alan J Pakula's drama, starring Robert Redford, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Robards and Hal Holbrook.(n)

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare.(n)

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: A politician's idealistic attitude to his career is contrasted by a disastrous personal life. He is forced to rethink his priorities when a sex scandal brings his reputation into disrepute in the aftermath of a catastrophic oil spill. Drama, starring Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Connie Nielsen and Peter Fonda.(n)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: A woman offers help to a stranger who turns up on her doorstep, claiming his car has broken down and asking to use her phone. He soon reveals his true identity as a dangerous ex-convict, and she and her family face a battle for survival when they are held hostage in their own home. Thriller, starring Idris Elba and Taraji P Henson.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare.(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: White Noise: The Light
programme.desc: A man tries to commit suicide following the murder of his family. Although close to death, he is revived and discovers he now has the ability to predict when others are about to die. Using his new-found psychic skill to save lives, he learns too late the dire and unforeseen consequences of his well-intentioned meddling. Horror, starring Nathan Fillion and Katee Sackhoff.

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighbouring woods. Horror, starring Kevin Durand, Lukas Haas and Steve Agee.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: A totalitarian regime in 2076 sets out to destroy a sub-species of vampiric mutants and take over the world. However, one of the vampires discovers a boy whose unique blood antigens hold the key to curing her kind - and risks her own safety to protect the child from government agents determined to kill him. Sci-fi thriller, starring Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright and Nick Chinlund.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: A totalitarian regime in 2076 sets out to destroy a sub-species of vampiric mutants and take over the world. However, one of the vampires discovers a boy whose unique blood antigens hold the key to curing her kind - and risks her own safety to protect the child from government agents determined to kill him. Sci-fi thriller, starring Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright and Nick Chinlund.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighbouring woods. Horror, starring Kevin Durand, Lukas Haas and Steve Agee.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary II
programme.desc: A boy's dog is killed by his abusive father, so he and his friend bury the animal in a place believed to hold the power of resurrection. Miraculously, the dog returns to the land of the living, but with a vicious new temperament, and savages the boy's father to death. The terrified son decides to try in turn to resurrect his parent, but with horrific consequences. Horror sequel, with Edward Furlong and Anthony Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: Former alien abductees fight fellow victims of extraterrestrial attacks who have been brainwashed into taking over the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Christopher Meloni, Marcia Cross and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: The elderly residents of a retirement home treat themselves to an occasional dip in the pool at an abandoned house. It turns out that friendly aliens in human form are using the place to restore dormant members of their species - and energy from their cocoons is giving the old-timers a new lease of life. Ron Howard's sci-fi drama, with Wilford Brimley, Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Don Ameche and Steve Guttenberg.(n)

programme.title: Cocoon: The Return
programme.desc: Three elderly couples return to Earth five years after leaving to retire on a distant planet, surprising their families, who assumed they were dead. Several of their alien friends have come back with them to recover members of their own race left behind in cocoons on the ocean floor, one of whom has been abducted by a government research institute. Sci-fi sequel, with Wilford Brimley, Don Ameche, Steve Guttenberg and Jessica Tandy.(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A second astronaut arrives on the strange simian-dominated world searching for his predecessor. As he journeys into the infamous forbidden zone, he discovers an underground cult of psychic mutants. Meanwhile, a military coup has taken place among the ape society, leading to an inevitable battle. Sci-fi sequel, with James Franciscus, Charlton Heston and Kim Hunter.(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate.

programme.title: MASH
programme.desc: American battlefield surgeons embark on a campaign of drinking, womanising and practical jokes in an attempt to alleviate the horror of the Korean War. Satirical comedy drama directed by Robert Altman, which spawned a long-running TV series. Starring Donald Sutherland, Elliott Gould, Tom Skerritt, Sally Kellerman and Robert Duvall.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: A cop embarks on his first day in narcotics, partnering a seasoned officer whose willingness to flout the rules forces him to question everything he has learnt. As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger.

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian.(n)

programme.title: The Necessary Death of Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: A troubled American travels to Romania in the aftermath of his mother's death. He becomes obsessed with a cellist he meets who is concealing a violent past. His efforts to romance her could cost him his life following a run-in with her brutally violent husband. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Evan Rachel Wood and Mads Mikkelsen.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A friendship develops between a down-at-heel streetwise New York eccentric and a naive Texas country boy who aspires to be a well-paid gigolo. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Brenda Vaccaro and Sylvia Miles.(n)

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: An angry teenage social outcast rejects any form of authority in his search for a sense of identity. Eventually, he finds solace in the company of two like-minded and equally alienated misfits. However, a spate of violent confrontations forces them to go on the run, and their plan to stay in hiding has tragic consequences. Drama, starring James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo and Jim Backus.(n)

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: A would-be music producer from Dublin believes he can make it big in Ireland by promoting a top-rate soul band, so he trawls a working-class neighbourhood and auditions unlikely singers and musicians to put together as a group. Alan Parker's urban comedy, based on the novel by Roddy Doyle, starring Robert Arkins, Andrew Strong, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball and Maria Doyle Kennedy.(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Family Business
programme.desc: Reformed crook Vito has turned away from a life of crime - much to the dismay of his criminal father, Jessie. However, when his son Adam comes up with a supposedly foolproof plan for a robbery, Jessie is quick to get involved - forcing Vito to grudgingly abandon the straight and narrow to keep an eye on his family. Crime comedy, with Sean Connery, Dustin Hoffman, Matthew Broderick and Rosana DeSoto.

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: A survivor of a near-extinct race is given a dangerous quest as his world approaches an astronomical event that will decide its future. He must find a way to restore a broken piece to a magical crystal, which has become a source of dark power for the cruel creatures who wiped out his people. Jim Henson's puppet fantasy, with the voices of Stephen Garlick and Billie Whitelaw.

programme.title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: A girl looking forward to the summer holidays is faced with a boring break when she realises her friends are going away. However, the future brightens up when she goes to stay with her eccentric aunt and embarks on a series of manic adventures. Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong.

programme.title: Aliens: Special Edition
programme.desc: Lone survivor Ripley is rescued in deep space decades after an alien creature wiped out her ship's entire crew. She is recruited to accompany a military expedition to a colony on the planet where she first encountered the monster, only to find the aliens have been reproducing and there are now hordes of them. Extended cut of James Cameron's sci-fi thriller sequel, with Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn and Lance Henriksen.

programme.title: Red Sorghum
programme.desc: A woman in 1930s China is forced into an arranged marriage to the owner of a winery by her father. When her husband dies, she devotes herself to making a success of his business and begins a relationship with the foreman - but her new life is threatened by the outbreak of war with Japan. Yimou Zhang's period drama, starring Gong Li and Wen Jiang. In Mandarin and Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A casino magnate approaches a group of no-hopers with the offer of $2million to whoever retrieves the sum from a locker in a train station in New Mexico, prompting a madcap cross-continent dash. Meanwhile, the casino owner's high-rolling gambler friends place bets on which of the bumbling contestants will win. Comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, John Cleese, Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Bates, Seth Green and Cuba Gooding Jr.(n)

programme.title: Swiss Family Robinson
programme.desc: An 18th-century family becomes shipwrecked on an island off the coast of Papua New Guinea. The father and his eldest son begin building a new home, but find their efforts jeopardised by the unwanted attention of nearby pirates. Disney adventure based on the novel by Johann David Wyss, starring John Mills, Dorothy McGuire, James MacArthur, Tommy Kirk and Janet Munro.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.(n)

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earth's core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planet's surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls.(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman has a chance encounter with a rogue secret agent, who has been framed as a traitor and is on the run from his own superiors. Realising she is in danger for knowing too much, he kidnaps her and drags her along on his desperate mission to clear his name. Comedy adventure, with Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The townsfolk is stunned by news of the attack on Pearl Harbor. Mary Ellen receives word that her husband is assumed to have been killed.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A decline in Mary's school performance is explained when Charles discovers that she needs glasses. However, she loses her confidence when her classmates begin to tease her.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura unwittingly befriends Walnut Grove's new banker while out fishing, and is stunned when he suggests she is only being kind to him so he will give her father a loan.

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part two of two. Meg's abduction of Eleanor hits the headlines, forcing her to go on the run under an assumed name. She breaks into Christine's family home and poses as a journalist in the hope of uncovering evidence of child abuse. Psychological thriller, starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe and Anthony Calf.

programme.title: Secret Santa
programme.desc: A 10-year-old orphan is sent to live with his aunt after the deaths of his parents, and befriends an old man. He starts to believe his new friend is really Santa Claus, but his new guardian worries that the seemingly kindly stranger is a conman taking advantage of the youngster's faith. Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Changes
programme.desc: Two single parents, a successful journalist and a wealthy, widowed heart surgeon, fall in love and rush headlong into marriage. However, the move proves to have far-reaching consequences for them and their children. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd, Michael Nouri and Christopher Gartin.

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo.

programme.title: A Dream for Christmas
programme.desc: An Arkansas minister moves his family across America when he is placed in charge of a Los Angeles church, only to find the congregation is small and the building threatened with demolition. The clergyman is determined to make a success of his new posting, and as Christmas approaches, something miraculous occurs. Drama, starring Hari Rhodes and Beah Richards.

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.

programme.title: Charles: A Man Alone
programme.desc: Documentary profile of the Prince of Wales, pondering what the future holds for the heir to the British throne.

programme.title: Princess Diana: The Uncrowned Queen
programme.desc: Documentary presenting an account of the princess's life.

programme.title: William and Kate: Into the Future
programme.desc: Documentary about the royal couple's relationship, that examines what the future may hold.

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth II: 60 Years On
programme.desc: A look back at the historical events of the queen's reign.

programme.title: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: A distraught woman struggles to overcome a wall of silence to find out the truth about her soldier son's death during the Vietnam War. As revelations about his accidental shooting emerge, the mourning mother launches a crusade against America's involvement in the conflict. Drama based on a true story, starring Carol Burnett, Ned Beatty, Sam Waterson and Dennis Erdman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family offers the new minister a place to stay, and Elizabeth falls in love with him. Erin offers to help the Baldwin sisters write their memoirs.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason wrestles with the morality of war as he decides whether to enlist in the army, while Jim Bob is desperate to join up despite being too young.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A talented player leaves the townsfolk convinced they will win an annual baseball game, but when they start betting on the event, his disapproving wife forbids him from taking part.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children compete in a leaf-collecting contest, but Mrs Oleson does not want her kids to be outshone.(n)

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost.(n)

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.(n)

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.(n)

programme.title: The Night They Saved Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's North Pole home is threatened when an oil company plans to drill in the vicinity, but the wife and son of a company employee are enlisted to help save the toy-making village from destruction. Festive fantasy, starring Art Carney, Jaclyn Smith, Paul Le Mat and Mason Adams.(n)

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.(n)

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: A former college professor launches a campaign for prison reforms while serving time in a harsh maximum security jail for manslaughter. Drama based on a short story by Truman Capote, starring Alan Alda, Vic Morrow, Dean Jagger and Billy Dee Williams.(n)

programme.title: Ambush in Waco
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the life of American religious leader David Koresh, whose belief in his own divinity eventually led to a violent and tragic confrontation with the authorities. Starring Timothy Daly and Dan Lauria.(n)

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma inherits an old friend's legacy and promptly decides to share the proceeds between her grandchildren, but her well-meaning action has unforeseen consequences.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An airmail plane has engine trouble and the pilot has to take emergency measures by landing the craft in the Waltons' meadow.

programme.title: Crown Heights
programme.desc: Two men living in a area surrounded by racial tension between the Jewish and Black communities try to bring their divided neighbourhood together through their passion for music in the aftermath of rioting. Fact-based drama, starring Howie Mandel, Mario Van Peebles and Jeremy Blackman.

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen.

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma finally returns home after her stroke, but everyone is so protective of her that she no longer feels she is needed or has a place in the family.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A handsome minister comes to Walnut Grove and causes a stir when he begins secret meeting with the town's women secretly - especially as Almanzo and John are away on business.

programme.title: Death in the Shadows
programme.desc: A man becomes convinced that his father is innocent of murdering his mother - despite his conviction in a court of law. Determined to get to the truth, he begins his own investigation, but faces an arduous struggle to ensure the real killer is finally brought to justice. Fact-based thriller, starring Peter Strauss, Henry Czerny and Lindsay Frost.

programme.title: The Forget-Me-Not Murders
programme.desc: A policeman races against time to find a serial killer who leaves dried flowers next to each of his victims, and the chase becomes even more desperate when he learns that his goddaughter could be next on the murderer's list. Detective thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Tyne Daly, Cliff Gorman and Neve Campbell.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Biopic of the African leader, following his rise to power in the 19th century as he united several tribes into a single state. Starring Henry Cele.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Four salesmen in a Chicago real estate office are issued with a warning that two of them will be fired. They resort to desperate and dishonest tactics to ensure they outperform their colleagues, but the eldest of the group fears his waning skills are not up to the task. Drama based on David Mamet's stage play, starring Jack Lemmon, Al Pacino, Kevin Spacey and Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of the two-part pilot of the drama series about an angel sent to Earth to help people improve their lives, beginning with the residents of a retirement home.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan needs to take Mark into his confidence and reveal he is an angel in order to complete his first assignment.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is captured by bank robbers and held for ransom.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A wanted murderer blames Matt for the death of his son, and gets his chance for revenge when the lawman strays into his territory.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica befriends a boy whose mother and sister were killed in an accident, but later learns one of them is still alive.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.sub-title: Show Me the Way to Go Home.
programme.desc: Monica fills in at a school as both history teacher and assistant basketball coach. Monica manages to help a student in the team with his game as well as the stubborn coach.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A jealous John-Boy runs into possible competition for the attention of his favourite schoolteacher.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen falls for a college student, while Grandma starts to feel the effects of old age as she reaches her 68th birthday.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.(n)

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.(n)

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Jenny is paralysed in an accident, but hope arrives in the form of an elderly doctor who takes her as his last patient. Ralph Bellamy guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.(n)

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.(n)

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Biopic of the African leader, following his rise to power in the 19th century as he united several tribes into a single state. Starring Henry Cele.(n)

programme.title: Against Her Will: The Carrie Buck Story
programme.desc: A woman with learning disabilities is declared unfit to raise her newborn daughter, but goes to court to fight for custody of the child. Drama, starring Marlee Matlin, Melissa Gilbert and Pat Hingle.(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around, until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. Determined to save Rae from herself, he initially imprisons her in his home, but, as they form a relationship, so she begins to understand the reasons behind her actions(n)

programme.desc: An officer mulls sacrificing passengers on an overcrowded lifeboat in order to prevent the vessel from foundering

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A grieving mother becomes possessed by an unknown dark force in this paranormal horror film. A year after the death of their child, Bethany (Sienna Guillory) and her husband are still reeling. After Bethany begins to act strange, and her behavior becomes increasingly more horrifying and dangerous, a priest (Eric Roberts) is called in to exprcise the demons that appear to be within her

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: In this riveting fantasy adventure, two siblings search for their missing parents after they learn they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairy-tale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: The members of a gentlemen's club in London challenge one of their number, the eccentric inventor Phileas Fogg, to navigate his way around the world by any means possible and return within 80 days. Fogg teams up with a Chinese thief and begins his odyssey under the watchful eye of a police inspector who believes he may have robbed a bank just prior to his departure

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: A movie-theater cashier believes he's the son of God, and is accosted by a ghost who claims to dwell in limbo. This forces him to rethink his place in the universe, and soon he believes the ghost can help him understand his fate

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: After discovering a top secret rocketpack, a stunt pilot makes a name for himself as a jet-powered superhero

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: The Host and Mother director Bong Joon-ho makes his English-language debut with this dystopian sci-fi thriller set in the aftermath of a failed global-warming experiment that ushered in the dawn of a new Ice Age. As a perpetual-motion engine keeps a super-powered locomotive speeding around the planet, the impoverished lower classes occupy the rear cars while the privileged upper classes are pampered in the front. The fragile balance of power between the two begins to shift, however, when an enigmatic message sparks a revolt that cannot be quelled. Luke Evans, Song Kang-ho, Jamie Bell, John Hurt, Tilda Swinton, and Ed Harris star

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Engineer Dev Patel reprograms a police droid so it can think and feel, but there are dangerous consequences. Sci-fi action with Hugh Jackman and Sigourney Weaver. (2015)(116 mins)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: In this riveting fantasy adventure, two siblings search for their missing parents after they learn they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairy-tale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: After discovering a top secret rocketpack, a stunt pilot makes a name for himself as a jet-powered superhero

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: The members of a gentlemen's club in London challenge one of their number, the eccentric inventor Phileas Fogg, to navigate his way around the world by any means possible and return within 80 days. Fogg teams up with a Chinese thief and begins his odyssey under the watchful eye of a police inspector who believes he may have robbed a bank just prior to his departure

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A small band of friends make an uneasy alliance with a mysterious lone wolf in this blend of horror and adventure. An unnamed catastrophe has turned the Earth into a wasteland, and as packs of feral cannibals wander the countryside, a dwindling number of survivors struggle to stay alive. Rick (Dominic Monaghan), Adam (Shawn Ashmore), Henson (Cory Hardrict), and Shannon (Shannyn Sossamon) have been journeying together for months and are the last living members of a much larger group. Mary (Ashley Bell) is a solitary woman who crossed paths with the survivors and is now traveling with them. She isn't interested in discussing her past or becoming friends, but the others learn she's a powerful ally in a fight. The travelers take shelter in a house, but are soon surrounded by cannibals; they quickly realize just how strong a warrior Mary can be, while also discovering the terrible truth that led her to wander alone. The Day was directed by Douglas Aarniokoski, who has accumulated extensive credits as an assistant director and helming second-unit material on major films(n)

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: A fractured family fights back against the vengeful wraith that's determined to kill them all, and trap their souls for all eternity. Upon learning his aging father's mental health has taken a turn for the worse, Michael Wolffsen (Tyler Mane) packs up the car, and hits the road with his nephew and fiancé in tow. His heavily fortified country home surrounded by acres of land, Michael's father Gary (Muse Watson) has been dabbling in the occult, and his new wife Annabelle is about to walk out on him. Meanwhile, Michael is convinced that his father is suffering from aggressive dementia, and seeks out a facility where he can be treated. Just when it appears that this family has a handle on their problems, however, a malevolent spirit (Derek Mears) appears determined to imprison their souls, and curse them for generations. Now, with their entire bloodline in danger, this family must fight to avoid a fate worse than death(n)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars decide to invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy(n)

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: A series of tragic events that blight a young boy's life are reversed one Christmas Eve, giving him and those around him the happy ending that they were destined to have(n)

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A group of bright youths attending space camp use their knowledge of science and astrophysics to help rescue three astronauts who are stranded on the International Space Station following an unexpected crisis(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: Skinny seventh-grader Spencer spends recess avoiding class-bully Turbo. But when Spencer dons an android cyborsuit that crashed in a meteor, Turbo will be no trouble. Spencer then learns he must defeat the outer-space arachnid, Broodwarrior(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love(n)

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: This sci-fi thriller finds the world in imminent danger when a collision in outer space sends huge pieces of interstellar debris on a path headed straight for Earth. A scientist has designed a system that would stop the largest meteor fragments from striking the earth, but a fanatical religious cult have made it their business to stop him. A convicted murderer (Ice-T) with ties to the group must now join forces with an FBI agent (Suzy Amis) to free the scientist from the cult's clutches and prevent millions of needless deaths. Mario Van Peebles and Linden Ashby appear in supporting roles(n)

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Scientists perform paranormal experiments on a woman, and strive to weaponize the evil within her. But the otherworldly power proves stronger than anyone anticipated, prompting a shocking series of events that the government tried to cover up(n)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Young Jamie is killed by a drag-racing gang led by Packard Walsh because he was caught romancing Keri, Packard's girlfriend. Suddenly a mysterious power creates Jake Kesey, a cool motor-biker who looks much like Jamie. Around the same time a black turbo racing car makes an appearance in the town. Packard's gang begin to suffer from a number of unfortunate "accidents"(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: A woman returns to her father's Louisiana home following a debilitating car accident, and explores the mysteries of her origins while confronting a malevolent ghost in this supernatural thriller from director Kevin Greutert (Saw 3D) and screenwriter Robert Ben Garant (Night at the Museum, Hell Baby)(n)

Packard's gang begin to suffer from a number of unfortunate "accidents"(n)

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: A horror-movie fan interviews lovers of the genre to understand why people like to be scared(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Robert Rodriguez teams with Frank Miller to direct this follow-up to "Sin City" that finds the character of Dwight getting wrapped up in the thralls of femme fatale Ava, and a mysterious gambler named Johnny on a mission to take down his sworn enemy in a high-stakes game of life and death

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: WWE superstar "Stone Cold" Steve Austin stars as a death row inmate who gets a rare second shot at life in director Scott Wiper's adrenaline-charged action thriller. Jack Conrad (Austin) is a dangerous convict currently awaiting execution in a corrupt Central American prison. "Purchased" by a wealthy television producer and transported to a deserted island, the formidable inmate is offered the opportunity to avoid capital punishment and win back his freedom by fighting to the death against nine other condemned criminals in an illegal game to be broadcast uncensored over the Internet. Rick Hoffman and Vinnie Jones co-star in a brutal battle royal of non-stop carnage

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Richard Linklater's Boyhood is a coming-of-age drama that the director spent twelve years making. He cast a young boy, Ellar Coltrane, and shot the film a few days at a time for over a decade so that he could capture how his leading actor, and the rest of his cast, aged. The film's story simply follows a boy named Mason (Coltrane) as he progresses from age 6 to 18 and deals with the typical travails of childhood like his parents' divorce, bad stepparents, falling in love, finding his artistic voice, and fighting with his bratty older sister. Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette co-star as Mason's parents

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: Disgraced record exec Mark Ruffalo attempts to kick-start the career of heartbroken songwriter Keira Knightley in this poignant musical comedy from the director of Once

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. While Grady is obsessed with his book, one of his students (Tobey Maguire) has an obsession of his own: finding a jacket once owned by Marilyn Monroe. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: In this hysterical comedy, a man becomes obsessed with trying to convince the most-popular guy from his high school to attend their 20-year reunion

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Harrowing docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned drone pilot, who controls spy aircrafts hovering over the Middle East from a trailer in Las Vegas, begins to feel morally disconnected from his military orders

programme.title: All Things Must Pass: The Rise and Fall of Tower Records
programme.desc: A retail powerhouse since 1960, Tower Records was the heart and soul of the music world until the company filed for bankruptcy in 2006. It is widely believed that the death knell of the once billion dollar behemoth is attributed to the meteoric rise of the internet but director Colin Hanks examines the other explosive factors responsible for the tragic demise of this iconic record store chain

programme.title: Begin Again

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this delightful romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: Hip-hop mogul Damon Dash wrote, directed, and stars in this hard-hitting examination of life in the criminal underground of a great city. Three different crime bosses are locked in a battle over the drug trade in Philadelphia. New York transplant Dame (Damon Dash) and his umbrella crew command a powerful network that controls the city's dope traffic, but he has two bitter rivals who both oversee competing gangs from behind bars -- Beans (Beanie Siegel), Philly-born leader of the once-dominant ABM Crime Syndicate, and Loco (Noreaga), a slick street hustler from Miami who has the bankroll to finance a powerful operation. As these three men and their underlings scramble for money and power, another player is quietly consolidating his forces and rising up against them. State Property 2: Philly Streets also features supporting performances from Mariah Carey, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Cam'ron, and a handful of other hip-hop and R&B stars

programme.title: Cockneys vs Zombies
programme.desc: Two Cockney siblings lead the residents of a quiet retirement community in a bloody war against the undead in this horror comedy from director Matthias Hoene. Andy (Harry Treadaway) and Terry (Rasmus Hardiker) were in the middle of robbing a bank to save the rest home where their grandfather lives when the zombie apocalypse struck East London. After arriving at the nursing home heavily armed and with cash in tow, the two brothers prepare to fight their way out with the assistance of some trigger-happy seniors. Michelle Ryan and Honor Blackman co-star(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy With W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: W. Kamua Bell hosts as some of the hottest comics take the stage at the SXSW festival. Appearing: Todd Glass; Wyatt Cenac; Iliza Shlesinger; Rachel Feinstein; Nate Bargatze; Matt Braunger; Mark Normand; Beth Stelling; Joe DeRosa; and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas(n)

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: A research scientist, his girlfriend and his teenage daughter fight for their lives in the African desert after incurring the wrath of ruthless arms dealers(n)

programme.title: After
programme.desc: Two bus-crash survivors awaken in an empty town and flee from an encroaching darkness(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Teens playing a spooky flashlight game in the woods at night get more than they bargained for when a demon is awakened by their shenanigans(n)

programme.title: Passion of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this unusual psychological drama about two women caught between reality and imagination. Marie (Moore) is an American widow trying to raise two children under difficult circumstances in a small town in France. Marty (also played by Moore) is a successful businesswoman in New York City who wants to leave her busy life and lead a quieter existence in Europe. But Marty is just a product of Marie's imagination -- or at least that's what Marie thinks. Marty, on the other hand, is convinced that Marie is just someone she dreamed up. Who is right? Or are both of them wrong? And where does it leave the men in their lives (Stellan Skarsgard and William Fichtner)? Passion of Mind was the first English-language film from French director Alain Berliner, best known for the arthouse success Ma Vie en Rose(n)

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong; Dane Cook. Cheech and Chong; Dane Cook(n)

programme.title: Inside Money
programme.desc: Topic: mutual-fund newsletters. Rick Dupuis is the program host(n)

programme.desc: When an actress lands a sexually explicit role, her unhappy boyfriend must either accept it or risk losing her in this romantic comedy loosely based on a true story(n)

programme.desc: A young blogger chronicles her misadventures in life and love on a popular Web site(n)
