programme.desc: An ex-con must pull off one last heist in order to pay his daughter's kidnapper, who mistakenly believes he possesses $10 million worth of stolen bonds

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity thrusts a young man into the middle of a war being plotted by two rival crime lords. Josh Hartnett and Bruce Willis star in this clever and stylish thriller filled with twists. Morgan Freeman, Ben Kingsley. Directed by Paul McGuigan

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In this thrilling adaptation of the beloved novel, a young man living in a totalitarian society learns the true history of his community from a mysterious yet seemingly benevolent figure known as the Giver. In time, the youth finds the burden of the truth too great to bear and plots to escape

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: The year is 2008 and US President Walter Emerson , is forced to make a monumental decision that will affect world history, in this taut political thriller. Trapped by a freak snowstorm in a tiny mid-American town in Colorado whilst campaigning for re-election, Emerson receives word that Iraqi dictator Uday Hussein has staged a surprise attack on Kuwait. It is the same type of attack which provoked the Gulf War in 1990, but this time Iraq has chemical and biological weapons ready to fire on Israel, Greece and Turkey

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Six decades after WWII, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) returns to Vienna in order to reclaim family belongings that were once seized by the Nazis in this poignant drama based on a true story. Chief among those items is the Gustav Klimt painting "The Lady in Gold." With the help of her ambitious young lawyer (Ryan Reynolds), the woman takes her fight all the way from Austria to the U.S. Supreme Court

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: This riveting epic tells two stories in two different time periods. In 1856, a slave and his family escape from a plantation near Richmond via the Underground Railroad. A century earlier, a slave-ship captain questions the morality of his mission

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Profiling DJ AM (aka Adam Goldstein), a hugely successful and influential disc jockey known for his mash-ups of popular songs. The film traces the course of his life as he found fame and fought to remain sober, only to relapse and die of a drug overdose at the age of 36 following the trauma of surviving a plane crash

programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this entertaining horror comedy, a demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break(n)

programme.title: Up Close & Personal
programme.desc: A story about a career television journalist who eclipses her mentor, this drama's plot resembles that of A Star Is Born, and it shares the same screenwriters as those who penned the 1976 version of that film, John Gregory Dunne and Joan Didion. It's based loosely on the real-life story of newscaster Jessica Savitch. Sally Atwater (Michelle Pfieffer) gets a job at a Miami TV station based on a demo tape from her hometown of Reno, Nevada. The station's news director is Warren Justice (Robert Redford), a former high-profile Washington newsman whose career has suffered from his insistence on integrity. He makes Sally his gofer and criticizes her clothes and appearance while she begs him for a chance to go on-air. She becomes the station's weathercaster and Warren gives her the stage name of Tally. With Warren's constant advice, she breaks into news reporting and her star rises quickly as the two become romantically involved. She takes a better job in Philadelphia, with Warren's blessing, and there she soon eclipses the anchorwoman Marcia McGrath (Stockard Channing). From there, Tally's career continues to flourish, while her relationship with Warren takes some strange twists and turns(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a hermit wizard must team up to battle a powerful druid in an effort to save the Celt people in the dark ages of Britain(n)

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: This comedic drama from cult director Kevin Smith marks the filmmaker's first movie to not feature Jay, Silent Bob, and the other characters of the universe created in his first five films. Ben Affleck stars as Ollie Trinke, a fast-talking music promoter, who finds his life turned upside down when he is faced with the pleasures and pitfalls of marriage and fatherhood after falling in love with Gertrude Steiney (Jennifer Lopez). Set in 1996, the film is loosely based on Smith's own experiences as a father. George Carlin, Jason Biggs, and Liv Tyler also star(n)

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A high-powered executive and her boyfriend go on a weekend camping trip in the Canadian wilderness. Unfortunately, the couple get lost during a hike, and end up being hunted by a vicious black bear(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. While Grady is obsessed with his book, one of his students (Tobey Maguire) has an obsession of his own: finding a jacket once owned by Marilyn Monroe. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: An exploration of the effects of single-parents households through a profile of various men who were raised by single mothers(n)

programme.title: Shaft

But as Shaft's net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Bale(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Adam and Lawrence have been chained up in a filthy bathroom with a corpse lying between them. They are the latest victims of 'Jigsaw', a madman who's twisted games always leave the players dead... or worse. Horror(n)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: Darren Lynn Bousman takes the helm for this sequel, with The Jigsaw Killer inviting capture by cop Eric Mathews. But once in custody, he reveals his latest puzzle; eight people, including Mathews' son Daniel are trapped in a derelict house. If they can solve the clues, overcome the murderous traps and work together, they may be able to escape. If not, the deadly nerve gas that's in the air will kill them in just two hours(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Writer and director Michael Mann updates the groundbreaking television crime series he created in the 1980s with this stylish thriller. Ricardo Tubbs (Jamie Foxx) and Sonny Crockett (Colin Farrell) are two police detectives working undercover in Florida; Tubbs is smart, cool, and resourceful, while Crockett has his own way of doing things, though he stays close enough to the rules to stay out of trouble. Their latest assignment is to get the goods on Arcangel de Jesus Montoya (Luis Tosar), a local drug kingpin whose men are believed to be responsible for a handful of recent murders. In order to infiltrate Montoya's operation, Tubbs and Crockett pose as powerboat racers willing to use their talents to pilot drug-smuggling ships for the right price. The detectives' ruse works, but as they dig deeper into Montoya's inner circle, they become involved in a dangerous operation that will take them to Haiti and Cuba, where neither the Miami Police Force nor the United States government can help them if things go wrong. Crockett also begins walking a risky path when he begins an affair with Isabella (Gong Li), a woman high up in Montoya's organization. Miami Vice marked Michael Mann's third consecutive directorial effort with Jamie Foxx after Ali and Collateral(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: This lively black comedy turns the zombie movie on its undead head. Billy Connolly is a howl as a zombie who's been domesticated to do work around a suburban couple's home, where he befriends their young son. All goes well until his electrified collar goes on the fritz and he reverts to his bloodthirsty, flesh-eating ways(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: A recent college graduate keeps stumbling as she steps out into the real world in this independent comedy drama. Aura (Lena Dunham) has just graduated from a university in the Midwest, receiving a degree in film theory that even she seems to realize is essentially worthless. With no real prospects she returns home to her mother, Siri (Laurie Simmons), a successful photographer living in New York City. Aura's 17-year-old sister, Nadine (Grace Dunham), is about to graduate from high school and is choosing which college to attend in the fall; Aura is ostensibly back home to help Siri and Nadine during a hectic time, but they don't appear to particularly need or want her assistance. Aura befriends Jed (Alex Karpovsky), a minor celebrity thanks to his surreal YouTube videos, who insists he's in New York to take meetings for an upcoming TV project; he soon invites himself into Aura's bedroom as a semi-permanent guest, though he clearly has no interest in any sort of romantic or sexual relationship. With little else to do, Aura takes a job at a nearby restaurant and becomes smitten with Keith (David Call), one of the cooks; while he seems attracted to her, he also has a girlfriend and it isn't until they're both stoned one night that he makes his move in a rather unusual setting. Tiny Furniture was written and directed by Lena Dunham, who also plays Aura; Laurie Simmons and Grace Dunham are her mother and sister in real life as well as in the film, which was mostly shot in Simmons' actual apartment. The film was named Best Narrative Feature at the 2010 South by Southwest Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold

programme.desc: This Hallmark Channel TV movie is one of several starring Kellie Martin as Samantha "Sam" Kinsey, the owner of a British-style American bookshop which traffics in mystery novels. On this occasion, Sam hopes to bring new customers into her establishment by inviting the once famous folk-rock trio of Steven, Dan and Carly (played by David Naughton, John Getz) and Ellen Greene) to perform at a charity show held near the "Mystery Woman" bookshop. Inevitably, a murder occurs, and the victim is Steven, Dan and Carly's much-despised promoter Jason Hurd. The prime suspect is Carly, who has apparently been engaged in underhanded dealings with her burned-out husband Dan. Taking a personal interest in the case is Sam's coworker, former CIA agent Philby (Clarence Williams III), who has idolized the musical trio since the 1960s. programme.title: Homeless: The Motel Kids of Orange County
programme.desc: Journeys with George director Alexandra Pelosi turns her attentions from politics to homeless children in this thought-provoking documentary. Despite its close proximity to Disneyland, life can be tough in Orange County, and nobody knows that better than the children who are forced to live in cramped hotel rooms while their parents struggle to earn an honest living. Despite being employed as a mechanic, six year old Rudee's father can't afford to rent an apartment for his family. In the past Rudee has slept in the bushes, but these days she sleeps with her mom and dad in a hotel room that costs nearly $900 a month to rent. Meanwhile, 11 year old friends Brenda and Meygan repeatedly find themselves battling bedbugs despite the fact that hotel management claims to have the problem under control, and a widowed mother of four works long shifts as a parking lot attendant at Disneyland just to keep her children well fed. Everyone who lives in the hotel dreams of better days, but with the economy in the gutter and no end in sight, most have relegated themselves to a difficult life on the margins of society. As Pelosi allows them the opportunity to tell their stories, we come to understand that the only thing that separates these desperate, hungry people from their comfortable, middle-class counterparts is a single stroke of bad luck(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle

programme.title: Unhitched
programme.desc: A lovelorn man setting out to find his way in life finds his heart captured by the striking, soon-to-be-bride that he senses is his true soul-mate in this romantic comedy starring Stuart Townsend, Seth Green, and Amy Smart. Soon after causing some ripples in the publishing world with his first novel, emerging writer Olly Pickering (Townsend) wanders wayward and is forced to accept a dead-end position as a lowly assistant. Though it initially appears as if he has entered into a downward spiral from which he isn't likely to emerge anytime soon, Olly finds his luck taking a turn for the better upon meeting the lovely Sarah (Smart) at the engagement party of a close friend. After discovering that Sarah is in fact the fiancée of his philandering friend and the pair have requested that Olly serve as the best man in the upcoming wedding, the dejected writer determines to convince the unsuspecting Sarah that she is about to marry the wrong man. With a little help from his wacky roommate Murray (Green), Olly may be able to put the breaks on the impending nuptials and prove his undying love for Sarah before she makes a mistake she is likely to regret for the rest of her life(n)

programme.title: Club Paradise

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are back in director Tim Hill's computer-animation/live-action hybrid following the further adventures of the world's most adorable singing trio. Songwriter Dave Seville (Jason Lee) has been struggling to gain recognition in the music industry for some time, and despite the fact that his former college roommate (David Cross) is now a high-profile powerbroker at Jett Records, Dave still can't manage to get a break. Things soon start to look up, however, when Dave discovers three singing chipmunks hiding out in the branches of a Christmas tree in Jett Records' world headquarters. Realizing that these woodland crooners cold prove to be his ticket to the big time, Dave does his best to transform Alvin (Justin Long), Simon (Matthew Gray Gubler), and Theodore (Jesse McCartney) into the next great pop sensation. As adorable and talented as they may be, though, these bouncy little critters aren't quite domesticated just yet; they still have a wild streak in them a mile wide, and it isn't long before Dave's life, home, and career are in utter chaos. But staying mad at such lovable little creatures is next to impossible, no matter what kind of mischief they might get into

programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: From the producers of Independence Day and Godzilla. Spilled toxic waste results in giant jumping, weaving and trapdoor spiders that attack a small town in this fun comedy starring David Arquette, Kari Wührer and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge(n)

programme.title: The Salton Sea
programme.desc: Strange thriller told in flashbacks about Danny Parker, a speed-using trumpet player determined to cope with his drug madness and avenge the murder of his wife by corrupt cops(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Second sequel to the remake of the 1960 Rat Pack caper finds suave con man Danny Ocean and his crew plotting to rob a casino owner who double-crossed Danny's mentor(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a cool camping weekend for five friends after graduation. But everything changes when a stranger with a horrific, infectious skin condition shows up(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A TV producer seeks to expose a tobacco industry cover-up with the aid of an ex-research scientist, but winds up fighting a battle on multiple fronts when the network balks at airing the story(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman and Kate Beckinsale star in writer-director Stephen Sommers' breathless, all-action roller-coaster of a CGI monster-hunt. It's the late 19th century and a secret organisation within the Vatican is determinedly pursuing its ages-old mission to ensure the extinction of all supernatural beings that threaten mankind. Their star creature-killer is Gabriel Van Helsing, who starts the movie in Paris, where he's on the trail of a rampaging Mr Hyde. Van Helsing is then dispatched to Transylvania, where his assignment is to assist Princess Anna Valerious in her long-standing quest to defeat Count Dracula. Van Helsing is abetted by the ingenious but timid and risk-averse Carl, who churns out a stream of gadgets and weapons (much in the manner of James Bond's inventor Q) for our warrior hero. But the undead nobleman awaits them, and he has forged an unlikely but deadly alliance with other supernaturals... It's not the most intellectually challenging of films, but it's certainly a thrilling horror-tinged fairground ride(n)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: College student Lewis Thomas takes a trip across country to pick up his dream girl, Venna. On the way he is joined by his brother Fuller and together they play a practical joke on a trucker over a CB radio. Now the trucker wants revenge..

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: A popular yet drunken actor reconnects with a group of his college friends for a wedding several years after graduation

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: Baseball could be the only ticket to success for hard-working Ryan. He wins a spot on the local team, but is caught between his off-field romance with holidaying Tenley and his sporting ambitions. Romcom with a good supporting cast

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain seeks out treasure in the Black Sea, despite a suspicion that he may be deceived

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four successful men find themselves easing into long-term relationships, but they're not all that comfortable about it, in this intelligent comedy-drama. Terry (Shemar Moore), Jackson (Morris Chestnut), Brian (Bill Bellamy), and Derrick (D.L. Hughley) are four close friends who get together once a week to play basketball and compare notes on their problems with women. And as it turns out, they have a lot to say in that area. Terry has just gotten engaged to BeBe (Susan Dalian), who is more than a bit controlling. Jackson has a deep fear of commitment, symbolized by a recurring dream in which he's attacked by women wearing wedding gowns; what's more, he's started seeing Denise (Gabrielle Union), who he learns once had a fling with his dad (Clifton Powell). Brian is a lawyer who has discovered his next court date will see him pleading a case in front of a judge who used to be his girlfriend (Angelle Brooks). And Derrick's marriage to Sheila (Tamala Jones) is falling apart at the seams. The Brothers also features one-time Jeffersons regular Marla Gibbs, and Jennifer Lewis as Jackson's mother, who may be giving his father a second chance after many years apart

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teenagers awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: An aspiring astronaut who was forced to forsake his dream of exploring space in order to save the family farm begins building his own personal rocket as a means of reaching the stars in this quirky rural drama starring Billy Bob Thornton. There once was a time when Charlie Farmer (Thornton) seemed like a shoo-in for NASA's esteemed astronaut training program. An Air Force pilot who held a degree in aerospace engineering, Charlie was well on his way to blasting off when a family crisis grounded his celestial aspirations. Of course, Charlie's feet may be firmly planted on terra firma these days, but his thoughts are constantly ascending into the clouds and beyond. It's been ten long years since the man who would navigate the stars began tending to the family farm, and during that time, Charlie has dedicated every moment of his spare time to building the rocket that will one day launch him into space. Though his devoted wife, Audie (Virginia Madsen), the pair's three children, Sunshine, Stanley, and Shepard, and even his father-in-law, Hal (Bruce Dern), all support Charlie in achieving his lifelong goal of becoming the nation's first independent astronaut, a last-minute hitch on the eve before the big launch unexpectedly stalls Charlie's countdown. It seems that Charlie's quest to obtain a substantial amount of high-grade rocket fuel has attracted the attention of not only the FBI, but the CIA, the FAA, and the United States military as well. Now, as the powers that be attempt to ground Charlie, citing concerns for civilian safety, a media frenzy descends upon the once-quiet farm as the reluctant renegade hero vows to show his children just how far one's courage and willingness to pursue one's own ideals can get a person when one refuses to give up hope. Northfork writing/directing duo Mark and Michael Polish team up to tell the tale of a man considered an oddity by his neighbors, a criminal by the government, and an inspiration by the media and the people

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: A healthcare tycoon is forced to share his hospital room with a mechanic when both are diagnosed with terminal cancer. The combative pair discover a shared interest in making the most of their remaining time

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: An exemplary biopic that focuses on the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece "In Cold Blood"(n)

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: Adaptation of Craig Lucas's play, concerning an unusual occurrence at the wedding reception of a Chicago couple (Alec Baldwin, Meg Ryan). Leah: Kathy Bates. Dr. Boyle: Ned Beatty. Mrs. Boyle: Patty Duke. Jerry: Richard Riehle. Old Man: Sydney Walker. Taylor: Stanley Tucci. Tom: Rocky Carroll. Directed by Norman Rene(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Pharmacy; Incoming Tide. In the first two parts of this four-part adaptation of Elizabeth Strout's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel spanning 25 years in a small Maine town, math teacher Olive Kitteridge helps Kevin, a smart but timid student whose mom is suffering from depression, a gesture that annoys her son, Christopher. Years later, the twentysomething Kevin returns to the area, and Olive ropes him into attending Christopher's wedding-rehearsal dinner(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: A Different Road; Security. In the final two parts, Christopher suggests counseling to his mother after she and Henry have a scary episode following dinner with friends. Later, Olive visits Christopher and his second wife in New York, but abruptly returns to Maine, where she gets some bad news about Henry and ultimately befriends a lonely widower she meets while out for a walk(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy cum thriller in which a man killed by a mugger returns as his young girlfriend's ghostly guardian. Realising, in his spirit state, that his murder was premeditated and that her life is in great danger, he tries to make contact through a fake spiritualist. But will his girlfriend take the woman seriously?(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow(n)

programme.desc: En 1962, Stephen Hawking entró en la prestigiosa Universidad de Cambridge donde estudió el cosmos. Allí, conoció a la bella Jane Wilde, con la que se casa. Sin embargo, su vida bascula cuando comienza a perder el control de sus piernas y brazos. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Este episodio le da una mirada a una fundación y muestra las rutinas de entrenamiento de algunos atletas olímpicos. Además, presenta a las estrellas argentinas de la NBA(n)

programme.desc: Una chef dedicada afronta el tener que cuidar de su sobrina huérfana de nueve años de edad y el trabajar con un hombre liberado, en esta comedia romántica que es una nueva versión del éxito alemán del 2001, "Mostly Martha". (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rainforest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James(n)

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Flight of the Conchords collaborators Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi reteam for this comical mock-documentary centering on four contemporary vampire roommates waging an immortal struggle to be cool. When they're not looking for their next meal or scheming to get into the hottest dance clubs, the bloodsucking foursome get their kicks by stirring up trouble with the local lycanthropes, or bickering to determine who's fallen behind on their housework. Rhys Darby, Jonathan Brugh, Stu Rutherford and Jackie van Beek co-star(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home in this terrifying remake of the horror classic. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn Wade sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses, funky music, a hot onboard dance club, and a bathroom attendant(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a soldier who is thrown out of the army for being too aggressive and ends up training a group of junior cadets. When the army no long wants him, he becomes desperate for a job, but his only offer of work comes from a private school where he is to teach a mixed bunch of children combat skills(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Based on her stage-play, Nia Vardalos stars as Toula Portokalos,a Greek woman who's approaching a certain age, as her family are more than happy to remind her of. And when she falls for Ian Miller, who's definitely not Greek, her family are in uproar, but Vardalos is determined to find happiness in Joel Zwick's Oscar-nominated comedy(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a Mende fisherman find their fates forever intertwined as they embark on a quest to obtain a rare and highly coveted pink diamond in director Edward Zwick's frantic adventure drama. Ripped from his family farm and forced to toil away in the sweltering South African diamond fields, Solomon Vandy (Djimon Hounsou) discovered an extraordinary rough stone of immeasurable value. Danny Archer (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a hired gun who specializes in the sale of so-called "blood diamonds" that are used to finance rebellions and terrorist organizations, and is currently serving time for smuggling. As a bloody civil war rages in Sierra Leone and Archer learns that Vandy has safely hidden the diamond in a place where no one would ever suspect, the pair enlist the aid of disillusioned American journalist Maddy Bowen (Jennifer Connelly) in recovering the treasure that has the power to save Vandy's family and provide the desperate Archer with a much-needed chance for redemption(n)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: This crowd-pleasing medieval adventure tale is very loosely inspired by Geoffrey Chaucer's The Canterbury Tales and mixes the anachronistic elements of modern-day rock music and colloquialisms with a period setting and characters. Heath Ledger stars as William Thatcher, a low-born 14th century squire who, in a fit of inspired spontaneity, replaces his deceased employer as the competitor at a jousting competition. Jousting is a pastime only permitted to knights, who are of noble birth, but Thatcher wins and decides to continue his new pursuits. With the help of his two fellow squire friends Wat and Roland (Alan Tudyk and Mark Addy) and none other than the gambling-addicted Geoffrey Chaucer (Paul Bettany), Thatcher has soon adopted a false identity and is winning one joust after another on his way to a championship in London. His victories inspire the affection of a female fan, Jocelyn (Shannyn Sossamon), and the ire of a competitor, Count Adehmar (Rufus Sewell), but Thatcher's ruse is threatened with exposure. A Knight's Tale is the sophomore directorial effort of acclaimed screenwriter Brian Helgeland, who won an Oscar for his work on L.A. Confidential (1997) and debuted behind the camera with the troubled production of Payback (1999)(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: 40-Year-Old Virgin star Steve Carell reprises his role as preening newscaster Evan Baxter in this heavenly sequel to the 2003 Jim Carrey comedy hit. Shortly after television anchorman-turned-U.S. congressman Evan Baxter (Carell) relocates his family from Buffalo to Northern Virginia, God (Morgan Freeman) reveals to him that a devastating flood is coming and the planet is about to be cleansed once again. Later, when Baxter accepts the responsibility of building a great ark and his rapidly changing physical appearance begins to draw media attention, his skeptical family attempts to discern if his actions are driven by delusion or divine intervention. John Goodman, Wanda Sykes, Jonah Hill, and Molly Shannon co-star in a divine comedy of truly epic proportions(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Sprawling, powerful, compelling series of intercut tales with a cast of heavyweights including an inspired Tom Cruise. Jason Robards plays Earl Partridge, whose son runs evangelical How To Get Laid seminars. A nurse contacts Cruise and the two come together for an uneasy, cathartic reunion(n)

programme.title: Scream

programme.title: 28 Days Later

programme.title: Screwed

Norm MacDonald stars as a chauffeur who decides to get revenge on his wealthy boss by kidnapping her dog. Produced under the titles Pittsburgh, Ballbusted, and Foolproof, Screwed also stars Danny De Vito, Dave Chappelle, Sherman Helmsley, Elaine Stritch, and Sarah Silverman(n)

programme.title: Being There
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated and BAFTA-winning Peter Sellers plays Chauncey Gardener, an idiot savant gardener whose rich employer dies, casting him into a world he's totally unprepared for. Falling in by chance with Shirley MacLaine and her rich, dying husband Melvyn Douglas (who won the Oscar for his performance), his simple homilies on gardening are seized on by Washington's great and good, right up to President, as pearls of wisdom and soon, it is his thoughts that are dictating the country's policies in Hal Ashby's gentle but barbed political satire(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Michael Keaton is Bruce Wayne, an enigmatic millionaire who, following the trauma of witnessing his parent's death as a child, dons a voluminous black cape by night to become the Batman, a shadowy figure who haunts the streets of Gotham City, fighting crime wherever it rears its ugly head. And it doesn't come much uglier than The Joker, a cackling killer with a frozen rictus grin whose deadly laughing gas threatens to wipe out the population of Gotham(n)

programme.desc: A college dropout (Giovanni Ribisi) running an illegal gambling casino out of his Queens house is recruited to work for a shady brokerage firm that sells bogus stocks over the phone to unsuspecting customers. Abby: Nia Long. Young: Ben Affleck. Greg: Nicky Katt. Chris: Vin Diesel. Michael: Tom Everett Scott. Marty Davis: Ron Rifkin. Richie: Scott Caan. Adam: Jamie Kennedy. Harry: Taylor Nichols. Seth's Mother: Donna Mitchell. Jeff: Jon Abrahams. Written and directed by Ben Younger(n)

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: A look at the Soviet Union's national hockey team and their decades of success in the sport. The filmmakers also profile superstar player Slava Fetisov, who turned to politics after his hockey career. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: An adventurous young British woman wins a scholarship to Oxford, where she falls in love with a fellow student. Later, their relationship is tested when he joins the military following the onset of World War I(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A rural high-school misfit, who lives with an equally odd family, helps his oddball friend run for class president. (cc)

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Schmidt and Jenko go undercover on a college campus, posing as students to bust criminal activity amid the undergrads. (cc)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: A pair of high-school geeks who are hapless with members of the opposite sex create what they believe is the ideal woman using a computer, and then a lightning storm brings that woman to life. (cc)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: A lovelorn journalist competes for the affection of his high-school crush against the private investigator he hires to track her down. (cc)

programme.title: Land Ho!
programme.desc: Two retirees take an invigorating trip to Iceland in a bid to recapture the spirit of their youth. Along the way, they experience the Reykjavik nightlife, have amorous encounters, soak in spas and raise a little hell. (cc)

programme.title: Fools Rush In
programme.desc: A buttoned-down businessman weds a free-spirited Las Vegas casino photographer when their one-night stand results in a pregnancy, and the two must deal with the resulting culture clash between their families. (cc)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Ten college friends reunite after seven years to inherit the fortune of a recently deceased pal, a successful Internet mogul whose will stipulates that they must spend five days together in order to receive the money. (cc)

programme.title: What Love Is
programme.desc: A motley crew of men and women come over to comfort a man jilted by his girlfriend, sharing their thoughts about love, sex, and modern romance over the long night. (cc)

programme.title: Office Space

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Trickster Sacha Baron Cohen offers yet another stinging dose of satire in this comedy that finds him assuming the persona of gay fashionmonger Bruno, the self-proclaimed "voice of Austrian youth TV." Originally conceived as part of the cult TV series "Da Ali G Show," the character of Bruno offers Cohen the opportunity to highlight the absurdities of homophobia and the fashion industry by interviewing celebrities, politicians and haute-couture hangers-on. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: A desperate Kansas City housewife (Diane Keaton) gets a job as a janitor at the Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other employees devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. programme.desc: It's a jam-packed return to the clubhouse this week! Let's Goer, Cuba, shows us what it's like to live on a narrow boat, including some home baking and pond-dipping for tadpoles. There are summer-holiday Send-ins from CBeebies viewers, telling the clubhouse crew what they've been getting up to! Let's Goer, Syon, has been inspired by super-heroes so he's making a movie trailer with his friends. And two teams battle it out in the huge, ginormous Supersize Showdown - it will get messy!
